channel.title: [PUBLIC BETA] Versatility OS- Decide your own fate!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pZMyEuA.gif[/img] [FONT=Impact][size=36pt]Welcome to Versatility [Early Beta][/size][/FONT]
[ul][*]Versatility is an Oldschool 317 server [*]OSRS items [*]Boss Pets [*]perfectly working combat [*]Completionest cape + Max Cape [*]all skills working and ready for you to master! [*]We are currently in the Early public beta phase [*]looking for staff, developers and designers! [*]Fully working minigames [*]Amazing staff / players[/ul]
So come along and enjoy the experience!
[CENTER] Changing NPC names Client side Changing shop contents Adding more buttons to client + possible realizable client changing loginbox changinc client frame and a few more :) [/CENTER]
[center][size=24pt]Website : [url=http://versatility-rsps.com]Versatility-RS[/url] Forum : [url=http://versatility-rsps.com/forums]Versatility Forums[/url] Client [URL=http://"http://versatility-rsps.com/Versatility-OS.jar"]versatility-OS Client[/URL][/size][/center] [FONT=Impact] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/0eae7d4c68404fdc8b71c4819cd81894.gif[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/fea9778e6649f0c672ea05c95918b840.gif[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/f61a319cebe85a812ec5ffe1d1e62a65.gif[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/0179df09fb2b4a012b671f7f6c181887.gif[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/a7badf3a899e04682d99688aa73aecbe.gif[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/62540bbb10ca1e80fb14d5c2f7cb84a2.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/c6b741a200d6a5d08ae80045748edd68.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/5aeaacdbca54ca3fcd46790f4f29d988.gif[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/a14c3176d5da8cf105df30fe6e6d1796.gif[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/d5045c786ce78f55f5df3bcad771f37e.gif[/img][/CENTER]
